resources.string:
Call Log Backup is the most simple app to backup your call log in your phone or in your email or cloud account. It also has powerful viewing, adding and editing capabilities.This call log app also comes with the handy features of single tap dialing and single tap Google search of any number.


This app is a must have for every Android phone or tablet.


The app allows you to view call logs by different types including duration and location. It can display 100, 500 or all stored call logs at any time. The app also has powerful filter capabilities which allow you to see calls logs based on specific location,duration or day.
